p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_69: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_100: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_103: Virginia Mason Franciscan Health (VMFH) radiology residency is a collegial, supportive, and flexible program offering exposure to patients with interesting, complex, and rare conditions. Our residents gain experience in advanced imaging and complex image-guided procedures early in training. The IR experience is outstanding and we offer ESIR for those interested in sub specialization. Our residents are also trained in VMFH's widely recognized innovative quality improvement methodology (VMPS).
